Module HW05
Package model

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver<IBallCmd>
    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObserver<IBallCmd>
    The Ball class provides methods and fields that are common to all balls.
    Author:
    Peter Dulworth (psd2)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball()
        No parameter constructor used for creating a null ball.

      • Ball

        public Ball​(java.awt.Point initialLocation,
            int radius,
            java.awt.Point velocity,
            java.awt.Color color,
            java.awt.Component component,
            IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd> updateStrategy,
            IPaintStrategy paintStrategy)
        The following constructor takes all the parameters and assigns them to their respective fields in the ball.
        Parameters:
        initialLocation - A point representing the initial location of the center of the ball.
        radius - An integer representing the radius of the ball.
        velocity - A point representing the velocity vector of the ball.
        color - A color representing the color of the ball.
        component - The component on which the ball will be painted.
        updateStrategy - The update strategy that the ball uses.
        paintStrategy - The paint strategy that the ball uses.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​(IDispatcher<IBallCmd> disp,
                   IBallCmd cmd)
        Description copied from interface: IObserver
        The update method called by the observer's dispatcher (observable)
        Specified by:
        update in interface IObserver<IBallCmd>
        Parameters:
        disp - The dispatcher that called this method
        cmd - The message being distributed to all the observers.

      • updateState

        public void updateState​(IDispatcher<IBallCmd> disp)
        Update the state of the ball. Delegates to the update strategy.
        Parameters:
        disp - The Dispatcher that sent the command that is calling this method.

      • move

        public void move()
        The following method updates the balls location based on its velocity vector.

      • bounce

        public void bounce()
        The following method detecting if the edge of the ball is beyond the top/bottom left/right edge of the canvas. It updates the location of the ball based on which wall it went past.

      • paint

        public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        The following method paints the ball on the canvas based on its color field, location and its radius.
        Parameters:
        g - This is the Graphics object that the ball should paint itself on.

      • interactWith

        public void interactWith​(Ball target,
                         IDispatcher<IBallCmd> disp,
                         java.lang.Boolean interactFirst)
        Used to invoke the ball's interaction strategy.
        Parameters:
        target - The Ball that is the "other ball" in the perspective of this processing.
        disp - The dispatcher.
        interactFirst - A boolean denoting whether this is the first in a series (usually two) of interactions.
